alert.note: Alert for Butts; Clayton; Coweta; Fayette; Henry; Lamar; Meriwether; Pike; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 4:16AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Spalding, southern Fayette, northeastern Meriwether, northern Pike, southwestern Henry, southwestern Butts, southeastern Coweta, south central Clayton and northern Lamar Counties through 445 AM EDT... At 415 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Rocky Mount, or 12 miles north of Greenville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Griffin, McDonough, Zebulon, Peachtree City, Hampton, Lovejoy, Locust Grove, Senoia, Grantville, Luthersville, Milner, Brooks, Moreland, Jenkinsburg, Williamson, Turin, Orchard Hill, Haralson, Woolsey and Sunny Side. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Butts; Clayton; Coweta; Fayette; Henry; Lamar; Meriwether; Pike; Spalding
